title: "Robots replace humans as news anchors, interviewers"
excerpt: "Since 2000, robots and automation systems have slowly phased out jobs done by humans, especially in the manufacturing industry. In 2019, a China state-run news agency, Xinhua News Agency shocked the world when it introduced a set of new AI anchors."
